rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective. 'strongest' modifies 'program'.
The segment contains Q5 reassuring cues ('will not enter the food system', 'strongest AI surveillance program') but no Q2 cues.
This provides a food safety assurance and describes surveillance actions, evaluated in Q5.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a positive fact ('will not enter the food system') and a superlative boast ('strongest AI surveillance program'), neither of which are explicit calming cues for Q5.
The segment mentions surveillance program strength but lacks a minimiser + scale contrast.
